TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Splitter extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示讓使用者調整停駐控制項大小的分隔器控制項。

span.span: Represents a splitter control that enables the user to resize docked controls.

summary.span: 已經由 所取代，而提供它的目的只是為了要保有與舊版之間的相容性。

span.span: has been replaced by and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可讓使用者調整控制項的邊緣是停駐控制項在執行階段。The control enables the user to resize controls that are docked to the edges of the control at run time. 當使用者通過滑鼠指標控制，游標會變更以表示控制項停駐於控制項可以調整大小。When the user passes the mouse pointer over the control, the cursor changes to indicate that the controls docked to the control can be resized. 控制項可讓使用者調整大小是固定的順序在它前面的停駐的控制項。The control enables the user to resize the docked control that is immediately before it in the docking order. 因此，若要讓使用者調整停駐的控制項的大小，停駐的控制項，您想讓使用者能夠調整大小的容器邊緣，接著將分隔器停駐容器的同一邊。Therefore, to enable the user to resize a docked control, dock the control you want the user to be able to resize to an edge of a container, and then dock a splitter to the same side of that container. 例如，若要建立類似於 Windows 檔案總管 視窗，加入控制項加入表單，並設定其屬性`DockStyle.Left`。For example, to create a window similar to Windows Explorer, add a control to a form and set its property to `DockStyle.Left`. 新增控制項加入表單，並設定其屬性`DockStyle.Left`以及。Add a control to the form and set its property to `DockStyle.Left` as well. 若要完成的表單配置，加入控制項，並設定其屬性`DockStyle.Fill`有佔用表單上剩餘的空間。To complete the form layout, add a control and set its property to `DockStyle.Fill` to have the occupy the remaining space on the form. 在執行階段，使用者可以再調整大小的寬度控制項 (以及控制項) 移動控制項。At run time, the user can then resize the width of the control (as well as the control) by moving the control. 為了確保控制項不調整大小的控制項的大小太小，無法用於使用者的停駐，您使用和屬性。To ensure that the control does not resize controls docked to a size that is too small to be useful to the user, you use the and properties. 和屬性決定控制項的最小大小停駐在左邊和右邊 (或排名最前面的上下如果水平控制項) 必須調整成。The and properties determine the minimum size that controls docked to the left and right (or top and bottom if a horizontal control) can be sized to. 如果您的表單上其他控制項的控制項停駐顯示特定框線的樣式，您可以使用屬性，以符合停駐在其控制項的框線樣式。If the other controls on your form that the control is docked to display a specific style of border, you can use the property to match the border style of the controls that are docked to it. 要設定的最大的大小限制在控制項控制項停駐。You might want to set a maximum size limit on controls that the control is docked to. 和事件可讓您決定當使用者是停駐調整控制項的大小。The and events enable you to determine when the user is resizing a docked control. 您可以使用屬性中的事件處理常式或事件，以判斷控制項的大小，停駐控制項並設定屬性設為不同的值來限制停駐控制項的寬度，以指定的最大寬度 (或如果水平對齊的高度控制項)。You can use the property in an event handler for the or events to determine the size of the control that the control is docked to and set the property to a different value to limit the docked control's width to a specified maximum width (or height if a horizontally aligned control). > [!NOTE] > 調整大小的控制項使用控制項只能使用滑鼠。Resizing a control using the control can only be done using the mouse. 不可能存取控制使用鍵盤。It is not possible to access the control using the keyboard. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用控制項結合和建立類似於 Windows 檔案總管 視窗的控制項。The following code example uses a control in combination with and controls to create a window similar to Windows Explorer. 若要識別和控制項、 節點和項目加入兩個控制項。To identify the and controls, nodes and items are added to both controls. 此範例會使用和屬性防止或會調整大小太小或太大的控制項。The example uses the and properties of the to prevent the or control from being sized too small or too large. 這個範例需要在此範例中建立的方法定義內和方法所呼叫的建構函式從。This example requires that the method created in this example is defined within a and that the method is called from the constructor of the . [!code-cpp[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，和屬性會設為 25。By default, the and properties are set to 25. 屬性設定為`DockStyle.Left`預設。The property is set to `DockStyle.Left` by default. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用控制項結合和建立類似於 Windows 檔案總管 視窗的控制項。The following code example uses a control in combination with and controls to create a window similar to Windows Explorer. 若要識別和控制項、 節點和項目加入兩個控制項。To identify the and controls, nodes and items are added to both controls. 此範例會使用和屬性防止或會調整大小太小或太大的控制項。The example uses the and properties of the to prevent the or control from being sized too small or too large. 這個範例需要在此範例中建立的方法定義內和方法所呼叫的建構函式從。This example requires that the method created in this example is defined within a and that the method is called from the constructor of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性通常是時使用的控制項控制項停駐就會顯示與特定的框線樣式，而且您想以符合其顯示樣式的控制項。This property is typically used when the controls the control is docked to are displayed with a specific border style and you want the control to match their display style. 例如，如果您有和控制項控制項將會停駐的您想要顯示不會產生框線，您可以設定屬性`BorderStyle.None`。For example, if you have a and a control that the control will be docked to that you want to display without any borders, you can set the property to `BorderStyle.None`.

One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義如何調整控制項大小的自動調整其父控制項大小時。Use the property to define how a control is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 您只能設定屬性， ， ，或。You can only set the property to , , , or . 控制項可讓使用者調整大小是固定的順序在它前面的停駐的控制項。The control enables the user to resize the docked control that is immediately before it in the docking order. 因此，若要讓使用者調整停駐的控制項的大小，控制項停駐容器的邊緣，並接著將停駐控制該容器的同一邊。Therefore, to enable the user to resize a docked control, dock the control to an edge of a container, and then dock a control to the same side of that container. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例類別。For more information, see the example in the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinExtra { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定必須在分隔器控制項和容器對側邊緣 (或停駐於該側的最近控制項) 之間所維持的最短距離。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum distance that must remain between the splitter control and the edge of the opposite side of the container (or the closest control docked to that side).

summary.span: 已經由 中的類似屬性所取代，而提供它的目的只是為了要保有與舊版之間的相容性。

span.span: has been replaced by similar properties in and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.

value.span: 介於 控制項與容器對側邊緣 (或停駐於該側的最近控制項) 的最短距離，以像素為單位。

span.span: The minimum distance, in pixels, between the control and the edge of the opposite side of the container (or the closest control docked to that side).
The default is 25.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在水平的控制項 (控制項停駐在頂部或底部容器)，保留供未停駐控制項的容器區域的最小高度是的高度減去這個值控制項。For a horizontal control (a control docked to the top or bottom of a container), the minimum height of the area of the container reserved for undocked controls is this value minus the height of the control. 針對垂直控制項 (控制項停駐容器左邊或右邊)，保留供未停駐控制項的容器區域的最小寬度是的寬度減去這個值控制項。For a vertical control (a control docked to the left or right of a container), the minimum width of the area of the container reserved for undocked controls is this value minus the width of the control. 使用者無法移動分隔器超過這個屬性所指定的限制。The user cannot move the splitter past the limit specified by this property. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為負數值，屬性值會重設為 0。If the property is set to a negative value, the property value is reset to 0. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用控制項結合和建立類似於 Windows 檔案總管 視窗的控制項。The following code example uses a control in combination with and controls to create a window similar to Windows Explorer. 若要識別和控制項、 節點和項目加入兩個控制項。To identify the and controls, nodes and items are added to both controls. 此範例會使用和屬性防止或會調整大小太小或太大的控制項。The example uses the and properties of the to prevent the or control from being sized too small or too large. 這個範例需要在此範例中建立的方法定義內和方法所呼叫的建構函式從。This example requires that the method created in this example is defined within a and that the method is called from the constructor of the . [!code-cpp[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定必須在分隔器控制項和該控制項停駐所在的容器邊緣之間維持的最小距離。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum distance that must remain between the splitter control and the container edge that the control is docked to.

summary.span: 已經由 和 所取代，而提供它的目的只是為了要保有與舊版之間的相容性。

span.span: has been replaced by and and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.

value.span: 以像素為單位的最短距離，介於 控制項與控制項所停駐的容器邊緣之間。

span.span: The minimum distance, in pixels, between the control and the container edge that the control is docked to.
The default is 25.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對水平控制項 (控制項停駐在頂部或底部容器)，這個值是可調整大小的控制項的最小高度。For a horizontal control (a control docked to the top or bottom of a container), this value is the minimum height of the resizable control. 針對垂直控制項 (控制項停駐容器左邊或右邊)，這個值是可調整大小的控制項的最小寬度。For a vertical control (a control docked to the left or right of a container), this value is the minimum width of the resizable control. 使用者無法移動分隔器超過這個屬性所指定的限制。The user cannot move the splitter past the limit specified by this property. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為負數值，屬性值會重設為 0。If the property is set to a negative value, the property value is reset to 0. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用控制項結合和建立類似於 Windows 檔案總管 視窗的控制項。The following code example uses a control in combination with and controls to create a window similar to Windows Explorer. 若要識別和控制項、 節點和項目加入兩個控制項。To identify the and controls, nodes and items are added to both controls. 此範例會使用和屬性防止或會調整大小太小或太大的控制項。The example uses the and properties of the to prevent the or control from being sized too small or too large. 這個範例需要在此範例中建立的方法定義內和方法所呼叫的建構函式從。This example requires that the method created in this example is defined within a and that the method is called from the constructor of the . [!code-cpp[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對水平控制項 (控制項停駐在頂部或底部容器)，這個值是可調整大小的控制項的高度。For a horizontal control (a control docked to the top or bottom of a container), this value is the height of the resizable control. 針對垂直控制項 (控制項停駐容器左邊或右邊)，這個值是可調整大小的控制項的寬度。For a vertical control (a control docked to the left or right of a container), this value is the width of the resizable control. 您可以使用屬性中的事件處理常式或事件，以判斷控制項的大小，停駐控制項，並限制其寬度，以指定的最大寬度 (或高度如果水平停駐控制項)。You can use the property in an event handler for the or events to determine the size of the control that the control is docked to and limit its width to a specified maximum width (or height if a horizontally docked control).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SplitterMoved As SplitterEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於移動分隔器控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the splitter control is moved.

summary.span: 已經由 所取代，而提供它的目的只是為了要保有與舊版之間的相容性。

span.span: has been replaced by and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建立事件處理常式事件以執行應用程式中的調整大小驗證。You can create an event handler for the event to perform resize validation in your application. 例如，如果停駐控制項的邊緣控制項和控制項，您可以撰寫程式碼事件，以判斷如果的最小和/或最大大小和控制項已超過和調整大小的控制項，其最小值或最大大小。For example, if a control is docked to the edges of a control and a control, you can write code in the event to determine if the minimum and/or maximum size for the and controls has been exceeded and resize the controls to their minimum or maximum size. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`Splitter1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Splitter1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#550](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#550)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#550](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#550)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建立事件處理常式事件以執行應用程式中的調整大小驗證。You can create an event handler for the event to perform resize validation in your application. 例如，如果停駐控制項的邊緣控制項和控制項，您可以撰寫程式碼事件，以判斷如果的最小和/或最大大小和控制項已超過和限制到最小值或最大大小的控制項調整大小。For example, if a control is docked to the edges of a control and a control, you can write code in the event to determine if the minimum and/or maximum size for the and controls has been exceeded and restrict the resizing of the controls to their minimum or maximum size. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`Splitter1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Splitter1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
